name: Table
description:
A table widget that lets you structure your fields to fit your data!


Field types that are currently supported:

  • Text (Single or multiline)
  • Email, URL
  • Numbers (With custom prefixes / suffixes)
  • Currency
  • Dates
  • Voting (Allow anyone to +1 by clicking on the cell)
  • Checkbox (Boolean)


Other features:

  • Easily reorder columns and rows of your table and customize your fields
  • Populate your table with the stickies on the page
  • Get started quickly with one of the pre-defined table templates
